content.rendered:
2023 Women’s World Cup Follow Team USA

Hotel Package7-night Packages (Ideal for experiencing two group stage matches) From12-night Packages (Ideal for experiencing three group stage matches) From
First Class Accommodations$3,945$6,335
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
* Exact itinerary, logistics, and accommodation cities will be determined by Roadtrips
* Number of nights in each city will be at Roadtrips' discretion.

2023 Women’s World Cup Follow Your Team

Hotel Package7-night Packages (Ideal for experiencing two group stage matches) From12-night Packages (Ideal for experiencing three group stage matches) From
First Class Accommodations$4,295$7,125
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
* Exact itinerary, logistics, and accommodation cities will be determined by Roadtrips
* Number of nights in each city will be at Roadtrips' discretion.

2023 Women’s World Cup Auckland Semi-Final

Hotel3-Night Packages (Aug 13-16) From
Hilton Auckland                    $2,645
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. Rates include all local and state taxes. A 35% deposit is required to secure your package. 35% is due one year prior to travel. The final balance will not be due until 4 months prior to travel. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.

2023 Women’s World Cup Championship Final

Hotel6-Night Packages (Aug 15-21) From
Sydney Harbour Marriott Circular Quay$4,875
Four Seasons Hotel Sydney$6,845
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. Rates include all local and state taxes. A 35% deposit is required to secure your package. 35% is due one year prior to travel. The final balance will not be due until 4 months prior to travel. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
